name: Basil
growing_tips: Aromatic herb perfect for cooking and garnishing
column15: Keep soil moist and pinch flowers to encourage leaf growth

name: Mint
growing_tips: Refreshing herb great for teas and cocktails
column15: Plant in containers to prevent spreading

name: Cilantro
growing_tips: Essential for Mexican and Asian cuisine

name: Parsley
column15: Trim outer leaves to encourage new growth

name: Lettuce
column15: Harvest outer leaves for continuous growth

name: Spinach
column15: Plant in cool weather for best flavor

name: Arugula
column15: Harvest when leaves are young and tender

name: Kale
column15: Remove lower leaves as plant grows

name: Swiss Chard
growing_tips: Colorful leafy green with edible stems

name: Zucchini
column15: Harvest when small for best flavor
